description.@en: Oil of snake and sugar water, this will cure what ails you . . .

effect.@en: After successfully casting, a salve is created. Once applied, the person moves one step up or one step down the Damage & Peril Condition Tracks positively or negatively (your choice).

criticalSuccess.@en: They are moved two steps up or down instead (your choice).

criticalFailure.@en: The salve spreads across your hands like rot. You move two steps down the Damage & Peril Condition Tracks negatively.

reagents.@en: Arsenic and a bandage, combined together (expended)
